mapper.select: SELECT id, date_consumed, year, month, day, weekday, amount, item, shop_name, category, payment, notes FROM money_manager WHERE uid = #{uid} ORDER BY date_consumed DESC
SELECT id, date_consumed, year, month, day, weekday, amount, item, shop_name, category, payment, notes FROM money_manager WHERE date_consumed=#{selectDate} AND uid=#{uid}

SELECT id, date_consumed, year, month, day, weekday, amount, item, shop_name, category, payment, notes FROM money_manager WHERE year=#{year} AND month=#{month} AND uid=#{uid} ORDER BY date_consumed DESC
